CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Account.Corporation_Type__c , "C-Corporation") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Corporation_Type__c , "Sole proprietor") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Corporation_Type__c , "Association") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Corporation_Type__c , "Co-ownership") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Corporation_Type__c , "Joint venture") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Corporation_Type__c , "Non-Profit") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Corporation_Type__c , "Trusteeship") , "Apr-Oct", "Mar-Sep")
CustomField.label: Cohort Sub-Season
